## ConnectionOption type

连接配置

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare type ConnectionOption = {
    dialect: DialectType;
    host?: string;
    port?: number;
    username?: string;
    password?: string;
    database?: string;
    connectTimeout?: number;
    idleTimeout?: number;
    pool?: {
        min: number;
        max: number;
    };
    cache?: boolean;
    debug?: boolean;
    entities?: Array<string>;
    usePool?: boolean;
    fullTableOperation?: boolean;
    fileLog?: object | boolean;
    options?: object;
};
```
**References:** [DialectType](./relaen.dialecttype.md)
